# <code>arg-true</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Returns indexes where values are true</div>

## Signature

```> arg-true```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Returns indexes where values are true
```shell
  > [false true false] | into df | arg-true
```
